We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner.

IMDb data; ttnr: 1595859, Title: Blue Bloods, --- Description: Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1595859, Title: Blue Bloods, --- Description: Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner.

IMDb data; ttnr: 1595859, Title: Blue Bloods, --- Description: Blue Bloods: Created by Mitchell Burgess, Robin Green. With Donnie Wahlberg, Bridget Moynahan, Will Estes, Len Cariou. Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee","dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Próba niewinności Agathy Christie
programme.desc: Boże Narodzenie 1954 roku. Zamożna filantropka Rachel Argyll (Anna Chancellor) zostaje zamordowana w swojej rodzinnej posiadłości. Podejrzenia zostają skierowane na jej adoptowanego syna, Jacka (Anthony Boyle), który trafia do aresztu. W prowadzonym śledztwie pojawia się jednak coraz więcej wątpliwości. Trzymająca w napięciu adaptacja prozy mistrzyni gatunku - Agathy Christie.

Revolves around a family of New York cops." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1595859/","name":"Blue Bloods","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjY0NTE1ODU3OV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTI4NDQwMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Revolves around a family of New York cops.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1595859/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"thelmalee"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoy the family dinners, and the religion (I'm not Catholic)","reviewBody":"My sister and I watch and discuss this series every Friday. We absolutely love the family dinners. So incredibly nice to see a family that all love and respect each other. Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

I'm looking forward to what script changes may be made - with the appointment of Bratton, our new police commissioner. 

(St. Vincent's Hospital is still open in this drama - ah, if only it were so.)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34487,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2010-09-24","keywords":"new york police department,family relationships,brother brother relationship,father daughter relationship,family of cops","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005531/","name":"Donnie Wahlberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005256/","name":"Bridget Moynahan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0261678/","name":"Will Estes"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0106949/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0315236/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0048735/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0121331/","name":"Mitchell Burgess"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1053841/","name":"Robin Green"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blue Bloods: Series","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4119967769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2YzZGNkZGMtYzFlMS00NDRhLTlkNmItMzZhZjVkNTdiMTc4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer for Blue Bloods"}}</script><metacontent="

Although challenges to their faith are often brought up - usually from questioning by the two sons. They make it clear that keeping faith takes work. 

I am not Catholic -- but I still very much appreciate their efforts. (Although I admit their attempts to depict other religions positively - is a hard go for them!)

programme.title: ABC Agathy Christie
programme.desc: Rok 1933. Emerytowany belgijski detektyw Herkules Poirot (John Malkovich) stara się wytropić wyrafinowanego seryjnego zabójcę, który wysyła tajemnicze listy podpisane "ABC". Śledczy musi je rozszyfrować, aby odkryć tożsamość niebezpiecznego przestępcy. Wspiera go inspektor Crome (Rubert Grint). Trzymająca w napięciu adaptacja prozy mistrzyni gatunku - Agathy Christie - z nominowanym w karierze dwukrotnie do Oscara ("Miejsca w sercu", "Na linii ognia") Johnem Malkovichem.

programme.title: Tamtej nocy
programme.desc: Zuzanna Szwarc (Hanna Konarowska), mama kilkuletniej dziewczynki, pracuje jako kuratorka sztuki. Pewnego wieczoru widzi napad. Dwóch mężczyzna atakuje chłopaka. Zuza nie pozostaje obojętna i stara się go obronić. Kiedy na miejsce przybywa policja, to jednak ona, nie sprawcy pobicia, zostaje aresztowana.

programme.title: Cocoon
Kokon
Cocoon
programme.desc:
Cocoon: Directed by Ron Howard. With Don Ameche, Wilford Brimley, Hume Cronyn, Brian Dennehy. When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigor." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0088933/","name":"Cocoon","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzFiMWRiZTItMjViNy00ZjUzLTg1MTMtNTU4OGRlNzA2MTc2L2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigor.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0088933/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"raymond-15"},"dateCreated":"2004-08-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Interesting and thought-provoking","reviewBody":"Made 20 years ago with some former well-known actors, this film has stood the test of time very well and delivers a very interesting and thought-provoking story about the mortality of man.

A group of people in a retirement village discover a neighbouring swimming pool which is out of bounds, but they have fun in it nevertheless. There are some strange objects lying on the bottom of the pool, but even more strange is the fact that after swimming there the old folk feel transformed and the vigor of their youth returns to their bodies. This makes for some light comedy as their hormones begin to take over.

These old people have a very serious decision to make and it is not an easy one. This is probably the best part of the film. Should they accept or decline the invitation? Having made the decision there is no turning back! We ask ourselves...what would we do placed in their circumstances? We feel very much involved. Thinking it over, isn't this proposal very much like what the Christian churches are promising us?

The final memorial church service by the sea is such a fitting ending and the little grandson David gives such a knowing smile as he raises his eyes to the sky.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":60009,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"1985-06-21","keywords":"alien,swimming pool,bare chested male,peephole,shapeshifter","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2708061721","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2EzOGMxOTEtNzNiNi00OWJkLWE4NTAtMzMyODk2MzBjMzJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2EzOGMxOTEtNzNiNi00OWJkLWE4NTAtMzMyODk2MzBjMzJkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000747/","name":"Don Ameche"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000979/","name":"Wilford Brimley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002025/","name":"Hume Cronyn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000165/","name":"Ron Howard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019166/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142386/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0070676/","name":"Tom Benedek"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0764545/","name":"David Saperstein"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Paul Newman: Błękitne oczy Hollywood
programme.desc: Bożyszcze światowego kina, Paul Newman, zasłynął licznymi kreacjami aktorskimi. Przeszedł do historii jako Butch Cassidy, nieugięty Luke, Rocky Graziano i Hud Bannon. Twórcy filmu przestawiają bogate dossier artysty, i to nie tylko aktorskie, ale też reżyserskie i producenckie. Poza tym opowiadają o życiu prywatnym Newmana. Pokazują go jako ojca, obywatela oraz pasjonata motoryzacji.

programme.title: Incident at Loch Ness
Incydent w Loch Ness
Incident at Loch Ness
programme.desc:
Incident at Loch Ness: Directed by Zak Penn. With Werner Herzog, Kitana Baker, Gabriel Beristain, Russell Williams II. A documentary exploring the myth of the Loch Ness monster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0374639/","name":"Incident at Loch Ness","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2OTUwMTYzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzA4MDcyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A documentary exploring the myth of the Loch Ness monster.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0374639/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Cheetah-6"},"dateCreated":"2004-12-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Clever, Amusing, Con Job That Leaves You Wondering","reviewBody":"Like a big budget Blair Witch Project this is a clever and amusing con job that shows the manipulative power of the documentary but as the film becomes more and more preposterous and the con becomes more obvious the joke goes a bit flat.

Lately the documentary genre has been messed with royally with blending opinion and personal agenda with fact mainly for entertainment value ala Michael Moore and Morgan Spurlock's Super Size Me, but this one side steps in yet another direction and seems to me to be satirizing the whole mocumentary process which would make it a joke within a joke and a true original. It's not entirely clear if this is the intent of the film, which only adds to the enigma. I like to think it is.

It is refreshing to see a legend like Herzog willing to poke fun at his own obsessive reputation and it's his charismatic presence that carries the film.

I don't know when the mocumentary first showed up in film but one of the first I recall that's well worth checking out if you like this sort of thing is Woody Allen's great from 1983: Zelig.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4091,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2004-09-17","keywords":"inverness scotland,fake cryptozoologist,wonderland avenue los angeles,year 2003,boat engine","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001348/","name":"Werner Herzog"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1128564/","name":"Kitana Baker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075244/","name":"Gabriel Beristain"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0672015/","name":"Zak Penn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0156805/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0672015/","name":"Zak Penn"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Werner Herzog (role=Self (Crew of Discovery IV)), Kitana Baker (role=Self), Gabriel Beristain (role=Self (Crew of Discovery IV)), Russell Williams II (role=Self (Crew of Discovery IV)), David A. Davidson (role=Self (Crew of Discovery IV)), Michael Karnow (role=Self (Crew of Discovery IV)), Robert O'Meara (role=Self (Crew of Discovery IV)), Zak Penn (role=Self (Crew of Discovery IV)), Steven Gardner (role=Self (Crew of Discovery IV)), John Bailey (role=Crew of Herzog in Wonderland), Matthew Nicolay (role=Crew of Herzog in Wonderland), Tanja Koop (role=Crew of Herzog in Wonderland)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0374639, Title: Incident at Loch Ness, --- Description: Incident at Loch Ness: Directed by Zak Penn. With Werner Herzog, Kitana Baker, Gabriel Beristain, Russell Williams II. A documentary exploring the myth of the Loch Ness monster." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0374639/","name":"Incident at Loch Ness","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE2OTUwMTYzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzA4MDcyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A documentary exploring the myth of the Loch Ness monster.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0374639/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Cheetah-6","dateCreated":"2004-12-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Clever, Amusing, Con Job That Leaves You Wondering","reviewBody":"Like a big budget Blair Witch Project this is a clever and amusing con job that shows the manipulative power of the documentary but as the film becomes more and more preposterous and the con becomes more obvious the joke goes a bit flat.

Lately the documentary genre has been messed with royally with blending opinion and personal agenda with fact mainly for entertainment value ala Michael Moore and Morgan Spurlock's Super Size Me, but this one side steps in yet another direction and seems to me to be satirizing the whole mocumentary process which would make it a joke within a joke and a true original. It's not entirely clear if this is the intent of the film, which only adds to the enigma. I like to think it is.

It is refreshing to see a legend like Herzog willing to poke fun at his own obsessive reputation and it's his charismatic presence that carries the film.

I don't know when the mocumentary first showed up in film but one of the first I recall that's well worth checking out if you like this sort of thing is Woody Allen's great from 1983: Zelig.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4091,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2004-09-17","keywords":"inverness scotland,fake cryptozoologist,wonderland avenue los angeles,year 2003,boat engine","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001348/","name":"Werner Herzog","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1128564/","name":"Kitana Baker","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075244/","name":"Gabriel Beristain"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0672015/","name":"Zak Penn"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0156805/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0672015/","name":"Zak Penn"],"duration":"PT1H34M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Coco avant Chanel
Coco Chanel
Coco avant Chanel
programme.desc:
Coco avant Chanel: Directed by Anne Fontaine. With Audrey Tautou, Benoît Poelvoorde, Alessandro Nivola, Marie Gillain. The story of Coco Chanel's rise from obscure beginnings to the heights of the fashion world." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1035736/","name":"Coco avant Chanel","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA0NjYzMzQxNzBeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDI2MDA0ODI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Coco Chanel's rise from obscure beginnings to the heights of the fashion world.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1035736/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Hannah_Winter"},"dateCreated":"2009-05-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Beautifully made","reviewBody":"It may be a subject that will not automatically appeal to many. However, this movie is certainly worth watching.

Audrey Tautou, complete with all the mannerisms and dark looks of Coco Chanel, plays a magnificent role. We start of at the miserable beginning of Gabrielle Chanel's life, in an orphanage. It quickly becomes clear that this is not the story about some high-society woman who got bored and decided to make clothes in a style that was unheard of at that time, even for people who don't know anything about the life of Coco Chanel. We see her, slowly but surely, clawing her way up in society, using her charm and wit, but most of all: her outspokenness, always telling what she thinks.

Cinematographically, this film is outstanding too. Throughout the film, certain elements of clothing (black and white patterns, stripes, men's shirts) are shown through an unclear lens, to point out that even the most early views of Coco on fashion were incorporated in her style later.

This film is not just a story about Coco's success, it's also about her struggle to fit in in a society that differed so much from her own opinions, about her losses and heartaches. All in all, we get a complete picture of the icon that is still loved and admired today.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":39646,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2009-04-22","keywords":"life of celebrity before becoming famous,social status,1920s,beach,wealth","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2992290329","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTY0ODg1MTUtODNmNC00ZDUzLWI3YzEtNWU1OGM2ODNiZmQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTY0ODg1MTUtODNmNC00ZDUzLWI3YzEtNWU1OGM2ODNiZmQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0851582/","name":"Audrey Tautou"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0688143/","name":"Benoît Poelvoorde"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005273/","name":"Alessandro Nivola"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0284774/","name":"Anne Fontaine"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030799/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0254563/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1212643/","name":"Edmonde Charles-Roux"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0284774/","name":"Anne Fontaine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1597664/","name":"Camille Fontaine"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Bedroom Window
Widok z sypialni
The Bedroom Window
programme.desc: The Bedroom Window: Directed by Curtis Hanson. With Steve Guttenberg, Elizabeth McGovern, Isabelle Huppert, Paul Shenar. A young executive starts an affair with his boss's wife which then escalates into a nightmare after he lies to the police in order to protect her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0092627/","name":"The Bedroom Window","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWQ4OWUxN2UtNTVhMy00Y2E3LTk0NTYtMjRiNzZjYjc1OTUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0NTI0Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young executive starts an affair with his boss's wife which then escalates into a nightmare after he lies to the police in order to protect her.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0092627/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Greensleeves"},"dateCreated":"2007-08-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Don't take it too seriously - just enjoy!","reviewBody":"This thriller would have made a great Hitchcock movie. As it stands, it's not too bad but it could have been so much better. However, any film that can engage the attention for nearly two hours must have something going for it and this does have an intriguing story line. It also has the advantage of a good cast, Steve Guttenberg is his usual affable self doing the wrong thing for the right reasons, Elizabeth McGovern brings a wonderful hard edge to her performance and Isabelle Huppert is beautiful but nasty. Brad Greenquist manages to imbue his role with a sinister quality without saying barely a word. The plot doesn't really hold up unfortunately and there are plenty of scenes that stretch credulity just too far. However if you are prepared to accept the film on just a surface level you will find yourself nicely entertained.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5417,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1987-01-16","keywords":"rape,neo noir,revenge,rape victim,hitchcockian","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000430/","name":"Steve Guttenberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001527/","name":"Elizabeth McGovern"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001376/","name":"Isabelle Huppert"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000436/","name":"Curtis Hanson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046277/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0390159/","name":"Anne Holden"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000436/","name":"Curtis Hanson"}],"duration":"PT1H52M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Simpatico
Simpatico
programme.desc:
Simpatico: Directed by Matthew Warchus. With Nick Nolte, Jeff Bridges, Sharon Stone, Catherine Keener. After scams at horse races and making lots of money, 3 young people split. 20 years later, one of them, a drunk, creates chaos with photos from back then." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0174204/","name":"Simpatico","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzE5YjQ0MjItOTNhMS00NTliLWJjYmEtMTE1NTExNjRlZjRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"After scams at horse races and making lots of money, 3 young people split. 20 years later, one of them, a drunk, creates chaos with photos from back then.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0174204/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Buddy-51"},"dateCreated":"2001-01-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"very weak film noir with great secondary characters","reviewBody":"Somewhere buried deep inside the mess that is `Simpatico' there lurk the makings of a pretty decent little love story. Unfortunately, one would have to eliminate pretty much the entire main storyline and all the major characters in order to find it. 

This tale of `three people caught in a web of their own making' is so thoroughly inept, overwrought and inconsequential that it seems more like a parody of film noir than a serious entry in the genre. The crime that these three people perpetrated in their youth  the one that keeps coming back to haunt them in their approaching middle-age - seems a piddling one at best for a film of this type. An even more serious problem is that the three lead performers seem stuck in roles that have come to define their métier as actors. Nick Nolte, for instance, plays his customary down-and-out, barely-teetering-on-the-edge-of-sanity middle aged loser whose capricious nature makes him forever a threat to the security of the group, while Jeff Bridges portrays the common sense, constantly put-upon ringleader who just wants to forget all about the past but who has a hard time keeping a leash on the unpredictable Nolte. Sharon Stone completes the trio as Bridges' now moody, alcoholic wife  a pale imitation of her much more meaty role in Martin Scorcease's `Casino.' Stone's over-the-top thespian simpering reduces the (fortunately) few scenes she is in to the level of unintentional high comedy. Moreover, in their attempt to provide a dual level structure to their tale  crosscutting scenes of the past with scenes of the present  the filmmakers have been forced to employ actors who look nothing like their contemporary counterparts. The result is, initially, confusing and, ultimately, quite ludicrous.

What is most strange about `Simpatico' is that, while the story itself fizzles and the audience could care less what happens to these three whining, puling, muking central characters, writer/director Matthew Warchus and co-author David Nicholls somehow manage to create a back story and two minor characters who engage both our sympathy and our interest. These come in the form of the always splendid Albert Finney as the man our intrepid band of halfwit con men managed to entrap into an extortion scheme twenty years earlier, and the charming Catherine Keener as the highly principled grocery store cashier who finds herself unwittingly a pawn in Bridges' plot to rein Nolte in. Finney and Keener provide so much warmth and humanity in their few scenes together that we find ourselves regretting that the film does not revolve around them entirely. Wisely, after we wheeze our way through all the hullabaloo and nonsense necessary to bring the main plot to its ludicrous conclusion, Warchus closes the film with a coda focused on these two winning characters. The finale, in some inexplicable way, seems more like a beginning than an ending and we find ourselves wanting to see what happens to this offbeat, likeable couple. By wasting our time concentrating on the Nolte/Bridges/Stone triumvirate of insipidity, the filmmakers end up making us feel even more resentful in the long run. Like the victims of the trio's racetrack shenanigans, we feel robbed!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3552,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2000-01-28","keywords":"kentucky,blackmail,scam,woman smoker,volkswagen beetle","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Simpatico","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2659385625","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2JiYTA1MjItM2ZkNS00NTFhLWJiNjYtN2FhNjhmOWY3NDcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2JiYTA1MjItM2ZkNS00NTFhLWJiNjYtN2FhNjhmOWY3NDcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Fine Line"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000560/","name":"Nick Nolte"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000313/","name":"Jeff Bridges"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000232/","name":"Sharon Stone"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911334/","name":"Matthew Warchus"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093471/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010090/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001731/","name":"Sam Shepard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911334/","name":"Matthew Warchus"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0390141/","name":"David Nicholls"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0174204, Title: Simpatico, --- Description: Simpatico: Directed by Matthew Warchus. With Nick Nolte, Jeff Bridges, Sharon Stone, Catherine Keener. After scams at horse races and making lots of money, 3 young people split. 20 years later, one of them, a drunk, creates chaos with photos from back then." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0174204/","name":"Simpatico","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzE5YjQ0MjItOTNhMS00NTliLWJjYmEtMTE1NTExNjRlZjRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"After scams at horse races and making lots of money, 3 young people split. 20 years later, one of them, a drunk, creates chaos with photos from back then.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0174204/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Buddy-51","dateCreated":"2001-01-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"very weak film noir with great secondary characters","reviewBody":"Somewhere buried deep inside the mess that is `Simpatico' there lurk the makings of a pretty decent little love story. Unfortunately, one would have to eliminate pretty much the entire main storyline and all the major characters in order to find it. 

This tale of `three people caught in a web of their own making' is so thoroughly inept, overwrought and inconsequential that it seems more like a parody of film noir than a serious entry in the genre. The crime that these three people perpetrated in their youth  the one that keeps coming back to haunt them in their approaching middle-age - seems a piddling one at best for a film of this type. An even more serious problem is that the three lead performers seem stuck in roles that have come to define their métier as actors. Nick Nolte, for instance, plays his customary down-and-out, barely-teetering-on-the-edge-of-sanity middle aged loser whose capricious nature makes him forever a threat to the security of the group, while Jeff Bridges portrays the common sense, constantly put-upon ringleader who just wants to forget all about the past but who has a hard time keeping a leash on the unpredictable Nolte. Sharon Stone completes the trio as Bridges' now moody, alcoholic wife  a pale imitation of her much more meaty role in Martin Scorcease's `Casino.' Stone's over-the-top thespian simpering reduces the (fortunately) few scenes she is in to the level of unintentional high comedy. Moreover, in their attempt to provide a dual level structure to their tale  crosscutting scenes of the past with scenes of the present  the filmmakers have been forced to employ actors who look nothing like their contemporary counterparts. The result is, initially, confusing and, ultimately, quite ludicrous.

What is most strange about `Simpatico' is that, while the story itself fizzles and the audience could care less what happens to these three whining, puling, muking central characters, writer/director Matthew Warchus and co-author David Nicholls somehow manage to create a back story and two minor characters who engage both our sympathy and our interest. These come in the form of the always splendid Albert Finney as the man our intrepid band of halfwit con men managed to entrap into an extortion scheme twenty years earlier, and the charming Catherine Keener as the highly principled grocery store cashier who finds herself unwittingly a pawn in Bridges' plot to rein Nolte in. Finney and Keener provide so much warmth and humanity in their few scenes together that we find ourselves regretting that the film does not revolve around them entirely. Wisely, after we wheeze our way through all the hullabaloo and nonsense necessary to bring the main plot to its ludicrous conclusion, Warchus closes the film with a coda focused on these two winning characters. The finale, in some inexplicable way, seems more like a beginning than an ending and we find ourselves wanting to see what happens to this offbeat, likeable couple. By wasting our time concentrating on the Nolte/Bridges/Stone triumvirate of insipidity, the filmmakers end up making us feel even more resentful in the long run. Like the victims of the trio's racetrack shenanigans, we feel robbed!","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3552,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2000-01-28","keywords":"kentucky,blackmail,scam,woman smoker,volkswagen beetle","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Simpatico","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2659385625","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2JiYTA1MjItM2ZkNS00NTFhLWJiNjYtN2FhNjhmOWY3NDcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2JiYTA1MjItM2ZkNS00NTFhLWJiNjYtN2FhNjhmOWY3NDcxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Fine Line","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000560/","name":"Nick Nolte","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000313/","name":"Jeff Bridges","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000232/","name":"Sharon Stone"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911334/","name":"Matthew Warchus"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0093471/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010090/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001731/","name":"Sam Shepard","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0911334/","name":"Matthew Warchus","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0390141/","name":"David Nicholls"],"duration":"PT1H46M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Spitsbergen
programme.desc: Magda (Magdalena Czerwińska), zawieszona ratowniczka medyczna, otrzymuje nagłe wezwanie. Oznacza to dla niej powrót do dramatycznych wydarzeń i ludzkich tragedii. Gdy opada poziom adrenaliny, kobieta przypomina sobie podróże na Spitsbergen - mroźną norweską wyspę na Morzu Arktycznym. To miejsce stało się dla niej powodem traumy, z którą do tej pory nie zdołała się uporać. Przerastają ją cudze nieszczęścia i własna przeszłość.

Amidst the war chaos Zosia tries to survive." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6068960/","name":"Wolyn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODM4YTk3NzgtMmUxNy00NThlLWE3YzctOWJhNmQ4OTBiZTkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzY4MDEwMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Despite being in love with a Ukrainian boy from the same village, Polish girl named Zosia is forced into marrying a wealthy widower. Soon World War II begins and ethnic tensions arise. Amidst the war chaos Zosia tries to survive.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6068960/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ktrelski"},"dateCreated":"2016-11-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Prepare yourself for sleepless night","reviewBody":"When I went to see this movie I thought I know everything about the events this picture is based on. I have heard that the movie will show them without any censorship. However, I was not prepared for the real horror of those events. The movie is graphic, but it does not go overboard. It does, however touch your soul. If you ever asked yourself what the real terror looks like, this is it. What makes it tough is that the terror is brought to you by the people you know well, your next door neighbors, your spouse or even your brother.

Do not expect anybody laughing or even talking after the movie is over. 

It is a great movie. Don't miss it.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5393,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"genre":["Drama","History","War"],"datePublished":"2016-10-07","keywords":"genocide,year 1943,world war two,massacre,nudity","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8443804/","name":"Michalina Labacz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1458971/","name":"Arkadiusz Jakubik"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm8443805/","name":"Wasyl Wasylik"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500530/","name":"Wojciech Smarzowski"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0692063/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0692062/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0043688/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1500530/","name":"Wojciech Smarzowski"}],"duration":"PT2H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Das Vorspiel
Przesłuchanie
Das Vorspiel
programme.desc: Das Vorspiel: Directed by Ina Weisse. With Nina Hoss, Sophie Rois, Thorsten Merten, Franziska Fauth. Anna Bronsky is a violin teacher at the Conservatoire. Against the advice of her colleagues, she imposes the admission of a pupil, in whom she sees a great talent. With a lot of involvement, she prepares Alexander for the end-of-year exam and neglects her young son Jonas, who is also a violinist and ice hockey fan. She moves away more and more from her husband, so fond of him, the French "luthier" Philippe Bronsky. At the approach of audition, Anna pushes Alexander towards performances more and more exceptional. The decisive day, an accident occurs, heavy consequence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8620154/","name":"Das Vorspiel","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjRkNDgzNmItYzAwZC00ZWE4LTliZjUtM2MyNGU2ODBhYjhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTQwMDA5NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Anna Bronsky is a violin teacher at the Conservatoire. Against the advice of her colleagues, she imposes the admission of a pupil, in whom she sees a great talent. IMDb data; ttnr: 8620154, Title: Das Vorspiel, --- Description: Das Vorspiel: Directed by Ina Weisse. With Nina Hoss, Sophie Rois, Thorsten Merten, Franziska Fauth. Anna Bronsky is a violin teacher at the Conservatoire. Against the advice of her colleagues, she imposes the admission of a pupil, in whom she sees a great talent. With a lot of involvement, she prepares Alexander for the end-of-year exam and neglects her young son Jonas, who is also a violinist and ice hockey fan. She moves away more and more from her husband, so fond of him, the French "luthier" Philippe Bronsky. At the approach of audition, Anna pushes Alexander towards performances more and more exceptional. The decisive day, an accident occurs, heavy consequence." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8620154/","name":"Das Vorspiel","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjRkNDgzNmItYzAwZC00ZWE4LTliZjUtM2MyNGU2ODBhYjhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTQwMDA5NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Anna Bronsky is a violin teacher at the Conservatoire. programme.title: Be Natural: The Untold Story of Alice Guy-Blaché
Bądź sobą, czyli nieopowiedziana historia Alice Guy-Blaché
Be Natural: The Untold Story of Alice Guy-Blaché
programme.desc: Be Natural: The Untold Story of Alice Guy-Blaché: Directed by Pamela B. Green. With Alice Guy, Jodie Foster, Pamela B. Green, Catherine Hardwicke. Pamela B. Green's energetic film about pioneer filmmaker Alice Guy-Blaché is both a tribute and a detective story, tracing the circumstances by which this extraordinary artist faded from memory and the path toward her reclamation." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3146022/","name":"Be Natural: The Untold Story of Alice Guy-Blaché","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODQwNTM4MjctMDljMi00ZTNiLWJjNWQtZTgzMDczNTkwOTBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjI3NDAyNg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pamela B. Green's energetic film about pioneer filmmaker Alice Guy-Blaché is both a tribute and a detective story, tracing the circumstances by which this extraordinary artist faded from memory and the path toward her reclamation.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3146022/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jfsinil"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Just saw this...","reviewBody":"I HAD heard of Guy-Blache, but then I have been a silent film geek for almost 50 years now. Have been catching what I can on-line of her work - so far, 1916 The Ocean Waif is the best, Doris Kenyon was a far more natural actress then Pickford or the Gish sisters based on that film.\n\nI think that Simon could have skipped including so many phone interviews with distance relatives of Guy-Blache, (many of which could have used subtitles, I found them hard to understand) and included some longer clips of her actual films instead. It is obvious that a lot of work went into digging up information on Guy-Blache, and I appreciate it, but would rather have seen more of her work than her family life. Still, I gave it 9 out of 10 stars since the subject matter is so important to film history...and I LOVE the opening postcard collages that take the viewer back in time and across the ocean!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":787,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2018-12-07","keywords":"f rated,filmmaking,alice guy blache character,nine word title,colon in title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Be Natural: The Untold Story of Alice Guy-Blache","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4115118617","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWMxMDlhOWItNmEwOS00NzkxLTlmNWUtOTIxNzA1MGZlZWVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWMxMDlhOWItNmEwOS00NzkxLTlmNWUtOTIxNzA1MGZlZWVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRoaXJkLXBhcnR5LXZpZGVvLXVwZGF0ZXI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0349785/","name":"Alice Guy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000149/","name":"Jodie Foster"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1652669/","name":"Pamela B. programme.title: Raising Arizona
Arizona Junior
Raising Arizona
programme.desc: Raising Arizona: Directed by Joel Coen, Ethan Coen. With Nicolas Cage, Holly Hunter, Trey Wilson, John Goodman. When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0093822/","name":"Raising Arizona","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGUwZTEwZTYtZmQ0OS00NmM1LWE2ZTQtNjZiYmE4ZmUxMjk1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0093822/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bat-5"},"dateCreated":"1998-10-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"pure lunacy","reviewBody":"Pure lunacy is what Raising Arizona is. It's got everything you could ask for in a film; kidnapping, jailbreaks, Hell's Angels, explosions and guns, guns guns. Nic Cage is great in the role of a very befuddled conveniance store robber who falls in love with Holly Hunter's Ed. Throw in John Goodman and William Forsythe as a couple of car stealing, bank robbing brothers and you got yourself scenes that will make you giggle when you think back about them. The entire state of Arizona seems trigger happy in the Coen's eyes. Clerks, cops, and crooks pull out firearms and let loose like the finale of the 1812 Overture. It's got everything you could ask for in a film; kidnapping, jailbreaks, Hell's Angels, explosions and guns, guns guns. Nic Cage is great in the role of a very befuddled conveniance store robber who falls in love with Holly Hunter's Ed. Throw in John Goodman and William Forsythe as a couple of car stealing, bank robbing brothers and you got yourself scenes that will make you giggle when you think back about them. The entire state of Arizona seems trigger happy in the Coen's eyes. Clerks, cops, and crooks pull out firearms and let loose like the finale of the 1812 Overture. Le Couperet
programme.desc: Le couperet: Directed by Costa-Gavras. With José Garcia, Karin Viard, Geordy Couturiau, Christa Théret. A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0422015/","name":"Le couperet","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc3MDAzNjYxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTIzMDA2MDE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chemist (Garcia) loses his job to outsourcing. Two years later and still jobless, he hits on a solution: to genuinely eliminate his competition.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0422015/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Angeneer"},"dateCreated":"2006-02-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"A frightening reality","reviewBody":"People who characterize this film as a comedy obviously haven't got it. The comic element is just a thin surface. This is a tragic story and a very strong political statement. Obviously Bruno's decisions and actions are absurd, but his circumstances are not. The movie offers an incisive look at the dark reality of chronic unemployment. Corporate greed leads to story after story after story of desperation. Westlake and Gavras know that in order to pass the message you have to lighten up the atmosphere (a la Truman Show), or else the viewer won't sit the whole movie. In order to appreciate the film you have to marginalize the main plot element (the murder story) and concentrate on all the subplots.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7855,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-03-02","keywords":"employment recruiter,competition,outsourcing,contestant elimination,unemployment","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1542634521","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWNjMWQ4ZmItOTVjMi00YzkxLWIzYmYtOWVjNTg3MDRkMzIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWNjMWQ4ZmItOTVjMi00YzkxLWIzYmYtOWVjNTg3MDRkMzIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0305296/","name":"José Garcia"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0895759/","name":"Karin Viard"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0597967/","name":"Geordy Couturiau"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002020/","name":"Costa-Gavras"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090675/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0056755/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0922799/","name":"Donald E. programme.title: The Iron Lady
Żelazna Dama
The Iron Lady
programme.desc:
The Iron Lady: Directed by Phyllida Lloyd. With Meryl Streep, Jim Broadbent, Susan Brown, Alice da Cunha. An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death while scenes from her past life, from girlhood to British prime minister, intervene." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1007029/","name":"The Iron Lady","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODEzNDUyMDE3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTgzOTg3Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death while scenes from her past life, from girlhood to British prime minister, intervene.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1007029/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Loving_Silence"},"dateCreated":"2011-11-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Meryl Streep gives a spectacular performance in a flawed, but great biopic","reviewBody":"Before viewing, "The Iron Lady", I didn't really know much about Margaret Thatcher. Other than she was the prime minister of England for 11 years, she was a very controversial figure and still is to this day. So I was really interested to see the film and I decided to visit the WGA screening.

Now let me begin by saying, Meryl Streep embodies Margaret Thatcher. She doesn't just look like her, but she talks like her, her facial expressions are spot on. Meryl Streep becomes Margaret Thatcher. I would be shocked if she doesn't win an Oscar for this performance. The supporting cast is good too, Jim Broadbent gives an excellent performance, everyone is just great.

However aside from the top notch acting, the movie had a few flaws. The story was uninteresting at times, the flashback scenes were a bit muddled and a little confusing. The movie felt a little too safe, it tried too hard, not to be controversial. Although I don't entirely blame the film itself for that. Margaret Thatcher was such a decisive person, that whichever side the film picked, it would be criticized by a lot of people. I guess the film ultimately achieved the goal.

I also liked the movie didn't dwell too much on the politics, but on the character of Margaret Thatcher. We see the human side of The Iron Lady herself, beyond all the partisan politics and rumors, we get to see a very personal and sad side of her. The subplot focusing on Thacther's grief over her husband's death, as the older version battles with hallucinations and an unwillingness to let go of her dear Denis are heartbreaking.

Overall the movie was really well done, but just shy of greatness. Meryl Streep's performance and the supporting cast, truly elevates the film into a great biopic. Although I wished a little more time was spent on focusing on her political life, the movie successfully showed a deep and moving side of the prime minister. Which a lot of biopics fail to do. Whatever your opinions might be on Margaret Thatcher, don't fault the movie because of the opinion. And I highly respect Phyllida LLoyd, Meryl Streep, Abi Morgan and others for trying to portray such a decisive and highly controversial figure.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106150,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-01-06","keywords":"10 downing street london,old woman,old age,british conservative party,british female politician","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1047305753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxMDYwNzc1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTg3OTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxMDYwNzc1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTg3OTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the life of Margaret Thatcher, the former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, with a focus on the price she paid for power."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000980/","name":"Jim Broadbent"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001290/","name":"Richard E. Grant"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1630273/","name":"Phyllida Lloyd"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242217/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022869/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0604448/","name":"Abi Morgan"}],"duration":"PT1H45M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1007029, Title: The Iron Lady, --- Description: The Iron Lady: Directed by Phyllida Lloyd. With Meryl Streep, Jim Broadbent, Susan Brown, Alice da Cunha. An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death while scenes from her past life, from girlhood to British prime minister, intervene." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1007029/","name":"The Iron Lady","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODEzNDUyMDE3NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTgzOTg3Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death while scenes from her past life, from girlhood to British prime minister, intervene.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1007029/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Loving_Silence","dateCreated":"2011-11-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Meryl Streep gives a spectacular performance in a flawed, but great biopic","reviewBody":"Before viewing, "The Iron Lady", I didn't really know much about Margaret Thatcher. Other than she was the prime minister of England for 11 years, she was a very controversial figure and still is to this day. So I was really interested to see the film and I decided to visit the WGA screening.

Now let me begin by saying, Meryl Streep embodies Margaret Thatcher. She doesn't just look like her, but she talks like her, her facial expressions are spot on. Meryl Streep becomes Margaret Thatcher. I would be shocked if she doesn't win an Oscar for this performance. The supporting cast is good too, Jim Broadbent gives an excellent performance, everyone is just great.

However aside from the top notch acting, the movie had a few flaws. The story was uninteresting at times, the flashback scenes were a bit muddled and a little confusing. The movie felt a little too safe, it tried too hard, not to be controversial. Although I don't entirely blame the film itself for that. Margaret Thatcher was such a decisive person, that whichever side the film picked, it would be criticized by a lot of people. I guess the film ultimately achieved the goal.

I also liked the movie didn't dwell too much on the politics, but on the character of Margaret Thatcher. We see the human side of The Iron Lady herself, beyond all the partisan politics and rumors, we get to see a very personal and sad side of her. The subplot focusing on Thacther's grief over her husband's death, as the older version battles with hallucinations and an unwillingness to let go of her dear Denis are heartbreaking.

Overall the movie was really well done, but just shy of greatness. Meryl Streep's performance and the supporting cast, truly elevates the film into a great biopic. Although I wished a little more time was spent on focusing on her political life, the movie successfully showed a deep and moving side of the prime minister. Which a lot of biopics fail to do. Whatever your opinions might be on Margaret Thatcher, don't fault the movie because of the opinion. And I highly respect Phyllida LLoyd, Meryl Streep, Abi Morgan and others for trying to portray such a decisive and highly controversial figure.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":106150,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"datePublished":"2012-01-06","keywords":"10 downing street london,old woman,old age,british conservative party,british female politician","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1047305753","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxMDYwNzc1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTg3OTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAxMDYwNzc1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTg3OTcyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A look at the life of Margaret Thatcher, the former Prime Minister of the United Kingdom, with a focus on the price she paid for power.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000658/","name":"Meryl Streep","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000980/","name":"Jim Broadbent","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001290/","name":"Richard E. Grant"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1630273/","name":"Phyllida Lloyd"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0242217/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022869/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0604448/","name":"Abi Morgan"],"duration":"PT1H45M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Crazy Six
Crazy Six
programme.desc:
Crazy Six: Directed by Albert Pyun. With Rob Lowe, Mario Van Peebles, Ice-T, Burt Reynolds. In a crumbling Europe, powerful mafia families have emerged from the anarchy to vie for control of the lucrative arms trade." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0118897/","name":"Crazy Six","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZWZjMzMyMWUtZDJkNS00ZDY4LWFkNTMtYTNhMzYyMjE3MWE1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a crumbling Europe, powerful mafia families have emerged from the anarchy to vie for control of the lucrative arms trade.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118897/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"refinedsugar"},"dateCreated":"2000-03-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"All style; no substance","reviewBody":"Honestly, I didn't really have high expectations for this movie, but at the same time I was hopeful. Having it be directed by Albert Pyun - a well known b-movie auteur - didn't exactly raise my hopes. I mean how many Albert Pyun flicks rank that highly? Yeah, exactly ... but still the movie advertised a decent cast. Rob Lowe, Burt Reynolds (pre-reborn stardom), Ice-T and Mario Van Peebles.

It all amounts to squat however as the movie is so boring and moves so slowly that the energy just seemed to drain right out of me the longer it went on. It runs over 90 minutes, but it's telling a story that could have been told in 30 minutes flat. I don't know what Pyun was going for here. I mean the movie drips artsy-like style, but it's a blur at times and maybe I'm an idiot for expecting more from Pyun this time around. Here he seemed to actually have a budget and a potentially great cast for the material, but it's all wasted. Crazy Six isn't much of an action film, it's not much of anything really.

I guess what's the saddest here is the fact that I found the end credits the most entertaining part of the movie. The music score is actually half-decent with some smooth female vocals too, but the rest is a complete waste and the less said the better. Avoid.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1612,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":2.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime"],"keywords":"shootout,dog,gangster,american abroad,drug addict","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Crazy Six","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1447274009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzlmNGIyY2YtNTg5OS00ZTU4LWJhMzgtNTNhMTliY2RjZGRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzlmNGIyY2YtNTg5OS00ZTU4LWJhMzgtNTNhMTliY2RjZGRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sterling Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000507/","name":"Rob Lowe"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000608/","name":"Burt Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005522/","name":"Mario Van Peebles"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0089502/","name":"Albert Pyun"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009633/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013199/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0950724/","name":"Galen Yuen"}],"duration":"PT1H34M"}</script><metacontent="

Having it be directed by Albert Pyun - a well known b-movie auteur - didn't exactly raise my hopes. I mean how many Albert Pyun flicks rank that highly? Yeah, exactly ... but still the movie advertised a decent cast. Rob Lowe, Burt Reynolds (pre-reborn stardom), Ice-T and Mario Van Peebles.

It all amounts to squat however as the movie is so boring and moves so slowly that the energy just seemed to drain right out of me the longer it went on. programme.title: Lavalantula
Lawalantula
Lavalantula
programme.desc:
Lavalantula: Directed by Mike Mendez. With Steve Guttenberg, Nia Peeples, Patrick Renna, Carlos Bernard. Volcanic eruptions in Los Angeles unleash a swarm of gigantic, lava-breathing tarantulas." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt4060576/","name":"Lavalantula","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEzMTY5OTEzNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzgwODM2NTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Volcanic eruptions in Los Angeles unleash a swarm of gigantic, lava-breathing tarantulas.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt4060576/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Prismark10"},"dateCreated":"2016-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Volcanic spiders","reviewBody":"Lavalantula with Steve Guttenberg. I was fearing the worst with this SyFy channel film and surprisingly ended up enjoying it.

A cheesy B film with decent enough special effects as Guttenberg plays a down on his luck actor who finds that there are a series of tremors in LA and then a volcanic eruption that spews up giant fire breathing spiders. Guttenberg needs to get to warn his wife and teenage son. Along the way he commandeers a Hollywood tour bus, gets help from a one armed former stunt man and gets exposition from a scientist in the museum at the La Brea Tarpits.

In the meantime Guttenberg is joined by his former co stars from the Police Academy films, there are in jokes such as the Blue Oyster bar being destroyed and a rip roaring speech by Guttenberg which owes a little to Independence Day.

Fun, action packed, cheap, cheesy and even a little scary. A real improvement from the usual SyFy output.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2962,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2015-07-25","keywords":"giant spider,family man,tremor,shaker,shotgun","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Lavalantula","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4037653017","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGJlMjMwOTYtMTJmMi00NjQ3LTk0ZmQtM2I5YmEzYTU4YzFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGJlMjMwOTYtMTJmMi00NjQ3LTk0ZmQtM2I5YmEzYTU4YzFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Lavalantula"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000430/","name":"Steve Guttenberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001604/","name":"Nia Peeples"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0719606/","name":"Patrick Renna"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0579079/","name":"Mike Mendez"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0282285/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1140089/","name":"Neil Elman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0579079/","name":"Mike Mendez"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4639862/","name":"Ashley O'Neil"}],"duration":"PT1H23M"}</script><metacontent="

Earthstorm
programme.desc:
Earthstorm: Directed by Terry Cunningham. With Stephen Baldwin, Amy Price-Francis, John Ralston, Dirk Benedict. A massive asteroid impact on the moon begins causing storms on Earth due to the sudden changes in ocean tides. Scientists conclude the only solution is to set nuclear charges on the Moon to implode it and keep it whole." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0491764/","name":"Earthstorm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDc3OWY2OWYtMmJkYy00MmJkLTk0M2UtNDYyNDAyN2U5NmI4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTY5Nzc4MDY@._V1_.jpg","description":"A massive asteroid impact on the moon begins causing storms on Earth due to the sudden changes in ocean tides. Scientists conclude the only solution is to set nuclear charges on the Moon to implode it and keep it whole.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0491764/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bendawson-1"},"dateCreated":"2006-12-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horibble acting and special effects","reviewBody":"This movie was just another Armageddon ripoff except with VERY bad acting and even worse special effects. The story is not even believable and they use a lot of technical jargon to try to overcome the obvious flaws in the plot. I cant believe I actually watched the whole thing! Stephen Baldwin should have not even been in this movie.

The rest of the cast didn't flow well together. There were way too many computer generated special effects that were too obvious. I can not stress enough how bad this movie was.

I don't recommend this at all!

SIMPLY HORRIBLE on sooooo many levels!!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":1}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1953,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"keywords":"disaster movie,disaster film,moon,demolition,demolitions expert","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Earthstorm","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1654915353","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjA5NWY0NDUtYzNiNy00MmFiLWFmZTUtNjFiMWQwMDhmZTlmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjA5NWY0NDUtYzNiNy00MmFiLWFmZTUtNjFiMWQwMDhmZTlmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from First Look"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000286/","name":"Stephen Baldwin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0697201/","name":"Amy Price-Francis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0707816/","name":"John Ralston"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0192463/","name":"Terry Cunningham"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0453070/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0307658/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0465480/","name":"Michael Konyves"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

Scientists conclude the only solution is to set nuclear charges on the Moon to implode it and keep it whole.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0491764/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"bendawson-1","dateCreated":"2006-12-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Horibble acting and special effects","reviewBody":"This movie was just another Armageddon ripoff except with VERY bad acting and even worse special effects. programme.title: True Bloodthirst
Vampyre Nation: Nacja wampirów
True Bloodthirst
programme.desc: True Bloodthirst: Directed by Todor Chapkanov. With Andrew Lee Potts, Heida Reed, Claudia Bassols, Ben Lambert. Set in a not-too-distant future in which a synthetic blood substitute, dispensed by the Romanian government, allows humans and vampires to potentially co-exist." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1982882/","name":"True Bloodthirst","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTEyODQ0MTkxNDNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU4MDE0ODcwMTMx._V1_.jpg","description":"Set in a not-too-distant future in which a synthetic blood substitute, dispensed by the Romanian government, allows humans and vampires to potentially co-exist.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1982882/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CinemaSerf"},"dateCreated":"2020-04-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Makes "Penny Dreadful" look good...","reviewBody":"I have to say that at times I thought I had accidentally stumbled upon a gay vampire thriller.... The "tense" scenes between Andrew Lee Potts and Ben Lambert (who looks like a pale, very pale, imitation of Paul Bettany here) made me want to shout something along the lines of "just kiss, already!" at the screen. However, they don't (sorry if that constitutes a spoiler) and we set off a fairly typical amalgam of "Underworld" style vampire v human set-piece battles as the good humans and vampires unite to stop the bad ones from trying to exterminate one and other. Of course, truth and trust rise above all this chaos and alongside Neil Jackson and Heida Reed we head to the cataclysmic denouement with lots of oomph but little enthusiasm. The effects are better than OK, but the dialogue is strained from the start; the accents risible and sadly, it is not at all scary.... Afraid I'd just give this a miss...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1628,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.2},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Horror","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2012-07-14","keywords":"vampire human coexistence,blood substitute","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Vampyre Nation","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3731400729","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjEzZjAxYjItNzczNi00MTU4LTg0YmQtMzQ0ZGM1MThkMjgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjEzZjAxYjItNzczNi00MTU4LTg0YmQtMzQ0ZGM1MThkMjgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Vampyre Nation"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498517/","name":"Andrew Lee Potts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4008100/","name":"Heida Reed"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2218213/","name":"Claudia Bassols"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1359237/","name":"Todor Chapkanov"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186146/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0080897/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0201678/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0337962/","name":"Jeffrey Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1878140/","name":"Rafael Jordan"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="
