programme.title: Monster Island
Monster Island
programme.desc:
Monster Island: Directed by Mark Atkins. With Eric Roberts, Toshi Toda, Adrian Bouchet, Natalie Robbie. Gigantic monsters threaten to destroy everything in their path as mankind remains defenseless." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10238788/","name":"Monster Island","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWJhMDA4YWYtNmY4Ni00ZjMwLTllNzQtNjM2ZDlmOWYyODBkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTc2ODExOTk@._V1_.jpg","description":"Gigantic monsters threaten to destroy everything in their path as mankind remains defenseless.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10238788/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TheLittleSongbird"},"dateCreated":"2019-07-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"Monsters versus mankind","reviewBody":"The Asylum have the odd watchable effort, but never has their best work really been more than that. Most of the time though, their output is rarely above mediocre and even often terrible, the worst without any redeeming qualities. Yet there is something compulsive about their relatively consistent badness, speaking as somebody who does not actually mind low-budget and can get enjoyment out of this kind of story, as long as some kind of effort is obvious.

'Monster Island', starting off on a kind note or at least an attempt an honest attempt of a kind note if it doesn't come over that year, is not one of The Asylum's worst. Nowhere near, although there is hardly anything good in 'Monster Island' to me (did have to look hard for them too) it isn't completely irredeemable like their worst efforts are. This is from personal perspective of course. Still found it monstrously bad, the flaws are many, almost every other way, and they are not small, huge actually. Saying this with regret not malice, and there is much more to the problem than being derivative.

Its least bad asset is the production design, the one asset where effort was obvious. Though this is only marginally so rather than significantly so. A particularly good job was done with the caves as has been said already. Some of the photography was okay.

Elsewhere, the production values were really poorly done and that the film was made on the cheap is obvious. It looks pretty drab, but it's the disorganised looking editing and last minute looking visual effects, that would even look out of date in the 50s, that come off worst. The submarine is used poorly and there is nothing authentic about it, it didn't look like a submarine and looked like it was filmed in a tank. What can be remembered of the music has very little presence and the film might as better well not had music at all because it didn't fit, added nothing and wouldn't have sounded appealing on its own.

Was expecting little from the script, and it turned out to be worse than expected with the cheese and awkwardness too frequently being rather hard to take. Predictability was hardly unexpected and would have tolerated it, providing that there was some degree of fun and suspense. Unfortunately, 'Monster Island' completely failed to be fun, even on a guilty pleasure level, and the stupidity became intelligence-insulting and exhausting after a while. The suspense was also absent and the whole film felt dreary. The monster action is limited, or at least what the underused creatures are given to do. What there was leaves one confused, bored and shouting at the screen in frustration and the creatures have little personality let alone menace or soul.

Got the sense that the director Mark Atkins had little plan of how to direct or structure 'Monster Island' or what to do with it or that his heart was barely in it. The characters were neither interesting or worth rooting for, there is so little to them in personality or development, their nonsensical decision making is both frustrating and disreacting and how they're written has been seen before many times. The acting is poor at best, the biggest name being Eric Roberts who acts like a sleepwalking robot.

Concluding, very bad. 2/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":582,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":2.6},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2019-06-01","keywords":"sea monster,helicopter,submarine,psychotronic film,underwater scene","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3779051289","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDE2MGVhZTktZGEwYy00NWEyLTg4MjgtYThkMDk2NzQ0N2Q5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDE2MGVhZTktZGEwYy00NWEyLTg4MjgtYThkMDk2NzQ0N2Q5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000616/","name":"Eric Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0865084/","name":"Toshi Toda"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1345685/","name":"Adrian Bouchet"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0040630/","name":"Mark Atkins"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0042909/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0040630/","name":"Mark Atkins"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

After an alien spacecraft destroys Washington, D.C., the residents of a small town must fight off a unit of alien soldiers on the hunt for the President of the United States and the mysterious device he's carrying after his escape chopper crash lands nearby." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8235966/","name":"Alien Siege","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjNjNjc5MzUtMDBlYi00ZjE1LThiYTQtNjU1MDA1NTAxNzc1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTkzMzg3NDM@._V1_.jpg","description":"After an alien spacecraft destroys Washington, D.C., the residents of a small town must fight off a unit of alien soldiers on the hunt for the President of the United States and the mysterious device he's carrying after his escape ch","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8235966/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sarkie-shaz"},"dateCreated":"2019-08-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Omg what have I just watched","reviewBody":"I can not believe what I have just watched, my eyes hurt, my brain hurts the thing was so goddam awful I had to watch it until the end just to see the full horror. I'm guessing somebody had a spare 50p to use up so they decided to make this thing. For the love of god I'll give you your 50p back just to get it off the air. Please writer's the next time you want to make a film get in touch and I'll give you a few unprofessional pointers on how not to traumatise an audience. programme.title: Grimm
Grimm
Grimm
programme.desc:
Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

Either way, the show is great, the stories are hella weird and this show is out there, along with American Horror Stories, the only two shows I'm currently watching on TV.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 1830617, Title: Grimm, --- Description: Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25","dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

Either way, the show is great, the stories are hella weird and this show is out there, along with American Horror Stories, the only two shows I'm currently watching on TV.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"</script><metacontent="

A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25","dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

Either way, the show is great, the stories are hella weird and this show is out there, along with American Horror Stories, the only two shows I'm currently watching on TV.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"</script><metacontent="

A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25","dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

Either way, the show is great, the stories are hella weird and this show is out there, along with American Horror Stories, the only two shows I'm currently watching on TV.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"</script><metacontent="

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

IMDb data; ttnr: 1830617, Title: Grimm, --- Description: Grimm: Created by Stephen Carpenter, David Greenwalt, Jim Kouf. With David Giuntoli, Russell Hornsby, Silas Weir Mitchell, Sasha Roiz. A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1830617/","name":"Grimm","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkyODg2MzQwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTA2MjE1MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"A homicide detective discovers he is a descendant of hunters who fight supernatural forces.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1830617/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ericsaxon25","dateCreated":"2011-12-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Show In A Time Of Great Shows","reviewBody":"I'm glad that the networks are finally competing for an audience again. A lot of TV series keep rehashing the same old stories and people are turning away to Cable TV for original shows.

I think "Grimm" is NBC's way of saying, "Hey there now, we're not giving up." Love the show, love the stories, was waiting for the next episode during Thanksgiving Weekend and now I'm waiting the week after and I have yet to see the next episode. I don't know why NBC is trying to kill this show by making its audience go somewhere else for entertainment.

Either way, the show is great, the stories are hella weird and this show is out there, along with American Horror Stories, the only two shows I'm currently watching on TV.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":112471,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Crime","Drama","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2011-10-28","keywords":"male protagonist,occult detective,supernatural power,psychotronic series,detective","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1365912/","name":"David Giuntoli","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0395203/","name":"Russell Hornsby","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593734/","name":"Silas Weir Mitchell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0250594/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0147414/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046592/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0139461/","name":"Stephen Carpenter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339264/","name":"David Greenwalt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0467942/","name":"Jim Kouf"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Grimm: Season 5","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3012080409","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWI1NTU1OWMtM2U3Yi00ZTY0LWI3YzEtZmMwOTRiN2M3ZmJiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Season 5 promo"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ultraviolet
programme.desc: Ein Polizist in Salt Lake City ist zunächst begeistert, als er für die Nachtwache im prestigeträchtigen Capitol-Theater eingeteilt wird. Doch dann müssen seine Partner und er Nacht für Nacht untersuchen, was es mit zuschlagenden Türen, Brandgeruch und anderen sonderbaren Vorkommnissen in dem angeblich leeren Gebäude auf sich hat.

Niebezpieczne kobiety","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzcwODNiOTQtMmY4OC00YmIzLWJiOWQtN2Y1ZjRlZDgwMTRiL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk0NTM4NDg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two female police officers fight to survive a police force filled with corrupt superiors and the brutal criminal mafia.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6212346/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"reinprn-29703"},"dateCreated":"2020-06-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good one.","reviewBody":"First of all i wanna say is that movie will give you some thoughts, thats guaranteed. There is a timeline or timeshifts two years back and two forth that will confuse you (saying: wth is happening?), and some very realistic and graphic scenes that will haunt you for days. why, i cant explain. I love idea to brighten everybody about the nature of criminal gangers cruelty and police corruption, and making sense about human overall. Thats pretty well displayed. Actors are really good, make you feel like you are seeing live shooting, what i havent seen really long time in a movie. But the bigger thing was that i didnt understand that in directors eyes was this violence and corruption a problem or did he agreed with it. Or this is just currenrt situation. In the scale of: left me too many questions vs too many answers i give 8/10. There is nothing funny in this movie. programme.title: Pan Wolodyjowski
Pan Wołodyjowski
programme.desc: Pan Wolodyjowski: Directed by Jerzy Hoffman. With Tadeusz Lomnicki, Magdalena Zawadzka, Mieczyslaw Pawlikowski, Hanka Bielicka. In 1668 Polish colonel Michael Wolodyjowski, who recently retired to a monastery, is recalled to active duty and takes charge of Poland's eastern frontier defenses against invading Tatar hordes and Ottoman armies." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0064785/","name":"Pan Wolodyjowski","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjcyMjhjZmEtMWViYy00MzhhLWJhNTktNDU0ZjI1ODgzZDQxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjMwOTA0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"In 1668 Polish colonel Michael Wolodyjowski, who recently retired to a monastery, is recalled to active duty and takes charge of Poland's eastern frontier defenses against invading Tatar hordes and Ottoman armies.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0064785/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nelly3"},"dateCreated":"2011-07-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"Engaging and Exhilarating","reviewBody":"Quite frankly, I was thoroughly captivated. This was made in 1969 and had there were those moments that seemed a bit dated, but nothing sufficient enough to dull the goings on in the film. I'll confess, I always find the love stories in the Trilogy to be a bit contrived (people do seem to fall in and out of love a tad too quickly), but here it was lively and fairly fun. There was considerable effort to make Wolodyjowski and Basia compatible in love and temperament. It was also fascinating to see a young Daniel Olbrychski in his heyday. The characters, major and minor, were all well developed, and the story invigorating. I wanted to fight some Ottoman Turks myself by the end.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1498,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"genre":["Adventure","History","War"],"datePublished":"1969-03-28","keywords":"army,turk,prince,saber,17th century","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0518591/","name":"Tadeusz Lomnicki"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0953843/","name":"Magdalena Zawadzka"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0668045/","name":"Mieczyslaw Pawlikowski"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388956/","name":"Jerzy Hoffman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0024010/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0006433/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0051785/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388956/","name":"Jerzy Hoffman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0527480/","name":"Jerzy Lutowski"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0797197/","name":"Henryk Sienkiewicz"}],"duration":"PT2H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Po śmierci narzeczonej płk Michał Wołodyjowski wstępuje do klasztoru. Zagłoba fortelem zabiera go z zakonu. Basia wyznaje miłość Małemu Rycerzowi, a Sobieski mianuje go komendantem stanicy w Chreptiowie.
